name: Origin Reboot
description:
"My life began under the moonlight of this dark knight"

All assets and coding was made in one week for the PB Game Jam 5.

Origin Reboot is a game about an AI in a robot being trained to parkour.  The scientist that supervizes your learning will show you examples to try to reproduce.

You will be able to explore maps in this retro-looking 2d platformer with flashy visuals. 

All assets were made for this game except sound effects.

Idea, Programming and Game Design : Bilel MEDIMEGH, Discord : LelouBil#9388

Art and Game Design : Pierre MARTINI

Music and Game Design : Jean-Cyril FOUASSIER
